value:
$WmMPID_カダインベレト,ch17_00_Byleth_M_Khadein,Face|You're Soren, yes? Might I have
a word?$k$p$WmMPID_カダインセネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Khadein,Face|Byleth, isn't it? Speak your mind,
but I will need to keep this brief.
I have a lot of studying to do.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインベレト,ch17_00_Byleth_M_Khadein,Face|I was attempting to read a Khadein
tome, but there are some things I was
unable to understand...$k$pI hoped to get your opinion on...this
part here...and this here. Oh, and
then this other bit...here.$k$pAnd then I also had a few questions
about this book as well.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインセネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Khadein,Face|...This doesn't sound like something
that can be addressed quickly.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Khadein,Face|Ah, there you two are. Studying
together, are we? Perfect.$k$pThere is something I wanted to ask
you to teach me, if you would.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインセネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Khadein,Face|I had not planned to get involved
with a study group...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_カダインベレト,ch17_00_Byleth_M_Khadein,Face|Thank you. I'm a professor at the
Officers Academy in my world,
you see.$k$pWith your help, I'll be able to better
teach my students upon my return.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインセネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Khadein,Face|Teaching is exhausting work.$k$pI can't imagine choosing to dedicate
your life to such a chore.$k$p$Sbs150|
